definitions.meaning: used as a greeting or to begin a phone conversation
examples: She said hello to everyone in the room
She gave me a warm hello

definitions.meaning: fluent or persuasive in speaking or writing
examples: An eloquent speaker captivated the audience
Her eloquent prose moved everyone to tears

definitions.meaning: the occurrence and development of events by chance in a happy or beneficial way
examples: A fortunate stroke of serendipity brought them together
It was pure serendipity that we met at the café
